reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for cat litter
reviews.reviewText: Got this to put the scooped cat litter into. Good size and the included plastic bags were appreciated. I like that it can be opened two ways. Will likely need some sturdier bags in the future but these will do for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this item; extremely well designed.
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this trash can and would highly recommend it. I searched through many similar products and returned one that was inadequate but this is just perfect. First of all the lid can be opened to hang down the back which gives a completely open top for inserting messy items, but then the lid easily swings back for a secure fit. This also comes with a scraper which is held in a very handy place. Thirdly it's easy to affix bags inside the can AND it came with two rolls of bags. Also it can affix or hang to your cabinets, be placed in side a cabinet or sit stably on the floor. It is sturdy but lightweight. Lastly, the price point was lower than many similar items. So I highly recommend this item!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's the perfect size and has a clean look to it. Very sturdy and I love that the lid can flip open however mine doesn't snap in tight enough and the weigh of the lid make it impossible for me to use it that way... I have to open it very carefully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for space saving
reviews.reviewText: Perfect little garbage in my rv kitchen limited space when I’m cooking and preparing this is easily mounted and holds a decent amount for the size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lid only opens part way
reviews.reviewText: It slides all the way off to the side but this the the max that it opens for the top. Very weird design. Returned it immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So perfect for my needs!
reviews.reviewText: I never knew I needed a hanging trash can until I did! I have been spending a lot of time in our spare bedroom with our new baby to allow the rest of the household to get some sleep. I end up changing diapers in there and eating in there and just generally producing a decent amount of trash for a bedroom. So I wanted something in reach of the bed that I could dispose of things in with a lid to keep any odors contained. This bin mounted easily to the side of a desk I have by the bed using the adhesive clip and has been up there for some time now (often with heavy diapers inside), and it hasn’t budged. It’s easy to open both ways that it does (which is a cool feature btw) and seals nicely. I’m so so glad I found this after browsing similar items for ages. It was the best deal by far and is a high quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently sent the below message only to find out I had not put the item together once I did that it works perfectly my apologiesPrevious message please disregard:I dislike it for use on the countertop everytime I try to open the lid from either side the bag slides down in the container because of the lid brackets in the way. Will replace it with something else.
